alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns; Western Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Freeze Watch issued January 19 at 12:49PM EST until January 21 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 possible. * WHERE...Inland St. Johns, Eastern Clay, Coastal St. Johns, Eastern Putnam, Eastern Marion, Central Marion and Western Marion Counties. * WHEN...From late Saturday night through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Appropriate action should be taken to ensure tender vegetation and outdoor pets have adequate protection from the cold temperatures. Young children, the elderly and the homeless are especially vulnerable to the cold. Take measures to protect them.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns; Western Marion
